content.p: For contact details of individual members of staff, please see our People page. You can also find many of our staff on ResearchGate and Twitter. The School of Pharmacy is located in three buildings on University Park. For maps and information about transport, visit finding us. Complete the Concern Notification Form General non-student enquiries: pharmacy-enquiries@nottingham.ac.uk Admissions enquiries: sciencessupport@nottingham.ac.uk School of Pharmacy University Park Nottingham NG7 2RD For all enquiries please visit: www.nottingham.ac.uk/enquiry
